availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert M. Clayton (Graves County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Graves County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Malinda Clayton. Father of Robert Clayton, Jeff Davis Clayton, and Richard L. Clayton. Farmer in Graves County in 1850 and 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Graves County, District No. 2, p. 381A. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Graves County, p. 23. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Graves County, Haynes Precinct, p. 5.
